forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 2 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 49. West southwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
The morning in Downtown San Francisco unfolds beneath a brilliant blue sky, a canvas unmarred by the usual veil of fog that often cloaks the city. While the sun bathes the streets in a soft glow, temperatures linger comfortably around the mid-sixties, creating a pleasant atmosphere that invites exploration. With only the gentlest of breezes brushing through, the morning air feels crisp and refreshing, ushering in a day that promises warmth without the swelter. As the hours pass, expect the mercury to dip gradually, settling into a cooler afternoon as the sun makes its descent. 

Tonight, the charm of this autumn day will give way to partly cloudy skies, allowing for a peaceful evening ideal for gentle strolls or basking on a cozy terrace. With temperatures dropping to the lower forties, a light jacket will serve well against the chill. Embrace the beauty of this day by indulging in the simple pleasure of a leisurely walk along the Embarcadero or perhaps savoring a cup of coffee in a picturesque café, where warm conversations can linger well into the evening.
